astralsorcery.journal.node.WELCOME.name: 欢迎
astralsorcery.journal.WELCOME.1.text: 我们很高兴您能选择星空学院进行本科魔法学习。您手上的宝典是由学院的讲师为您在学院学习期间而特别准备的学习指南。  所有宝典都链接到我们的星能档案中，会随着您的学习进度自动扩展可用的资料。<NL>因此，您可以靠自学而不需要学院的教授来言传身教的指导。
astralsorcery.journal.WELCOME.2.text: 以最适合的进度来适配您的学习需求。<NL>但不要误以为您的学习会很轻松。与其他的学习机构相比，本学院需要证明您对于星能操纵基本原理有一定程度的了解，才能获准星能宝典从星能档案中获得更多的研究资源。<NL>我们都祝您学习顺利！<NL>——星空学院全体教职员工。
astralsorcery.journal.node.SHRINES.name: 圣陵学院
astralsorcery.journal.SHRINES.1.text: 该学院认为在建有神殿的地区附近有利于进行实地研究。它们一般有两种变体：内藏有能进行星能操纵的浮动水晶的大型精致神殿和较小型的初学者遗迹。这两种类型的建筑内都有储存着研究物资的箱子，当然其内的物品也会受上个使用该建筑的使用者而有所变化。大型的神殿通常位于没有树荫遮蔽的空旷区域，比如沙漠或者高山顶部。
astralsorcery.journal.SHRINES.2.text: 大型的神殿内含有可以用于聚焦和操纵星能的标准聚能水晶。所有人都能借此对五大明亮级别的星座之一进行调和共鸣，对于初学者来说在研究起步阶段有极大的助益。<NL>虽然这些水晶本身是完美无瑕的，但它们是重新精制而成的，本质不够纯净，因此不要期望它与那些熟练掌握水晶调制技术者制作的聚能水晶有相同的星能量。这些水晶也因此无法进行性能强化。
astralsorcery.journal.SHRINES.3.text: 作为公共学习工具的浮动水晶周围设置了特殊的力场控制结界以防止提升者取走或修改它们，这保障了该区域所有提升者的重复利用性。<NL>该学院提醒所有提升者，星能是无法穿透所有不透明的固体物质。当学院需要关闭时，会进行顶部覆盖以防止学区受到恶劣天气和敌对生物的影响。必须移除顶部覆盖物，才能使用浮动水晶收集星能。
astralsorcery.journal.node.CPAPER.name: 星图
astralsorcery.journal.CPAPER.1.text: 在圣陵学院的库存内可以找到辅助学习用的羊皮纸。这些羊皮纸与现有的星能档案相匹配，会在使用者首次观看的时候检测相关的档案记录来生成星图，只要他们能够对星能操纵概念有足够的了解就会揭示出其他有关知识。因此，不会给如何提升者生成重复的记录。多余的物资应留给其他提升者。这些星图记录可以存储在宝典内。
astralsorcery.journal.CPAPER.3.text: 按住Shift的同时打开宝典，可以对其进行参考。<NL>若有提升者因失误而丢失星图，学院将不会重新发放这些资料。不过，可以向其他提升者借取一份副本，或者在可以使用更高级的合成祭坛的时候手工重新将星座知识拓印到羊皮纸内。对于如此重大的过失来说是相对较小的代价。不过，多亏了转位魔法，即使替换了宝典，提升者仍然可以查看存放在宝典中的文件。
astralsorcery.journal.node.WAND.name: 共鸣星杖
astralsorcery.journal.WAND.1.text: 多亏了学院的养护，浮动水晶会将星能洒落到附近的合成台上，其他聚能水晶可以做不到。但这种行为也会产生大量的星能浪费与奇异的混乱，因此无法用于更精巧的工艺上。任何提升者获得的第一个工具必是共鸣星杖，该星杖可以通过右键控制星能从星能感应装置以及特制工具的释放。
astralsorcery.journal.WAND.3.text: 鉴于其对聚集星能异常敏感，因此可以在晚上用它来找寻冲突的星能共振区域。当在露天的夜晚时，星杖的共振频率会揭示出该区域的地下深处有§3结晶态§r星能析出的区域。<NL>这些区域在地面上看起来如同星能在地面移动而形成的烟雾弥漫区。
astralsorcery.journal.WAND.4.text: 共鸣星杖的另一个作用是激活那些需要复杂结构运行的星能装置，如果结构错误，它会在异常的星能中断区突出显示，提醒使用者尽快排除故障问题。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ORES.name: 矿物
astralsorcery.journal.ORES.1.text: §8§n水晶石矿石：§r 在基岩附近的地下深处，因高压而形成的极其稀有且脆弱的晶体。这些晶体具有独特的晶胞结构，这使其对于星能十分敏感。尽管这些晶体本质十分脆弱，但它们被固定在坚硬的岩石层中，必须用坚固的工具（比如钻石）才能进行开采，否则会破坏其内脆弱的晶体。手持共鸣星杖时能够直视星能共振场。
astralsorcery.journal.ORES.2.text: 当靠近这些晶体沉积物时，可以通过发光的异常星能点找到它们进行挖掘。<NL>§9§n海蓝宝石砂岩：§r 受沿河岸与海滩上连续不断的水流长久的冲刷而沉积的零散晶体，这些晶体在受到持续的低能星辉照射下产生了应激反应，这形成了一种十分适合星能合成上的自然转化的资源。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR1.name: 星辉合成台
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.1.text: 星能的纯净度很容易根据材料的属性重新调整为有序状态来达到预期目的。在圣陵学院的聚能水晶附近放一个合成台，力场控制结界将星能自动重定向，把合成台转化为更适合提升者使用的星能合成工具。这款入门级的合成台采用最纯净的大理石制成，可以将天空中或聚能水晶内的纯净星能过滤吸收，将其重定向到放置在其内的合成材料上，而不必依赖那混乱而无法控制的能量脉冲上。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.2.text: 为了让它能吸收星能需要一个露天的环境。另外，它也缺少聚能水晶那样能够有效防止星能逸散的再充能矩阵，因此星能的逸散是无法避免的。学院的测量结果表明，海平面高度大致是逸散损失的中间点，在基岩层时星能几乎完全逸散了，大气层在高度为海平面的两倍时，将停止逸散。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.4.text: 如果合成台的位置高于大气层，或通过其他方式让其突破大气层高度是无效的，建议将合成台重新放置到其他正常的位置上。星能并非在天空上均匀分布的，部分地区的可用星能量会远超其他地区。值得庆幸的是，星能的总量不会因这类鲁莽的行为而匮乏，目前调查组暂未发现有大范围的绝星能区。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.5.text: 在合成台上摆放后制作配方原料的物品后，用共鸣星杖右键单击引导合成台内储存的星能，使其充分与原材料结合。当物品制作完成后会自动从合成台内弹出。当前合成台所储存的星能会显示在合成台界面的下方。由于星能的逸散性，其会以波动状态增减。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR1.6.text: 这种储存功能不同于电池那样随时间而充能，而是反映当前合成时所有收集到的可用星能总量。除了最简单的设备，工具和材料处理之外，所有这些都将需要合成台提供其内储存的更大量的纯净安全的星能进行重定向。<NL>一旦有提升者用其构建必要的工具继续深入学习时，他们还需要在星能概念上获得足够的知识来改进合成台，提升它的使用效率。
astralsorcery.journal.MARBLETYPES.1.text: 星辉法师需要的是一种极其纯净的特种大理石。可以在地下的零散的矿脉中找到这种具有独特的奇妙质感且能对星能进行高度反射的大理石。至于其他的低纯度大理石，由于无法进行更细致的能量控制，是无法与星能进行交感作用的。以特定的雕琢方式改变大理石的纹理，会改变大理石控制附近星能的渠道。<NL>
astralsorcery.journal.MARBLETYPES.2.text: 虽然这与学院的公共神殿以及学生聚集区内公用的大理石相同，但学院在此郑重告诫所有提升者，盗窃或破坏学院公共财产大理石的将受到院级处分，严重者甚至将被开除出学院。
astralsorcery.journal.SOOTYMARBLE.1.text: 把一些神奇的过滤元素（比如煤炭）作为大理石的表面涂层，可以改变大理石的性质，而不仅仅是使其变得“肮脏”。特殊的共振方式已经从根本上改变了大理石的性质，因此即使洗去灰尘也无法改变大理石通过表面吸收和反射特殊能量的性质与新外观。
astralsorcery.journal.SOOTYMARBLE.2.text: 在纯化大量星能内蕴含的杂质时是十分有用的，因为在使用星能收集装置吸收星能时是有极大可能吸收到大量的杂质的。
astralsorcery.journal.HAND_TELESCOPE.1.t: 尽管星体在星空中不断的在移动，但仍然会显示出特定的位置。对于那些星能敏感者而言，则能感应到某些重复出现的图案与形状中蕴含的特殊能量。这些奇特的星座的运动规律与月相有关。可以使用一种特制的玻璃镜片使观察者更清楚的对它们进行观测。虽然望远镜是最基础的观测设备，但它仍能提高你对星空的观测效率，
astralsorcery.journal.HAND_TELESCOPE.4.t: 不过受其他星座的能量干扰，每个夜晚，望远镜只能对一个星座进行观测。<NL>观测时必须保证周围没有任何的障碍物，并且要发现过对应的星图才能使用望远镜绘制该星座。更重要的是，但你发现了需要绘制的星座时，按住shift固定望远镜，然后用左键对星座的图案进行详细的测绘。
astralsorcery.journal.HAND_TELESCOPE.5.t: 如果不以这种方式保持镜面绝对静止，或者没有以接近完美的精度绘制星座的话，是无法§3发现§r它们的。一旦完成星座的绘制，其将永久固化在你的脑海里，星座中的强大能量让你从此以后再也无需任何设备就能再夜空中看到它。
astralsorcery.journal.ILLUM_POWDER.1.tex: 荧石对星能也是有反应的，即使与微量的海蓝宝石接触也会发生明显的共振现象。把海蓝宝石与荧石磨碎的粉末混合在一起，它们之间会产生剧烈的高能反应。将这种粉末扔出会在空间中形成一个魔法光源。<NL>其本质就是一团漂浮的粉尘，在不知情的情况下，不会像火把一样熄灭，要做到这点需要用液体或方块对其进行覆盖。
astralsorcery.journal.NOC_POWDER.1.text: 虽然暗室是一般情况下用来强制生成怪物并收割它们身上珍贵素材的正常方式，但暗室除了没有光线的要求外，还有严格的后勤要求。<NL>通过利用辉光粉内的星能与其他活性成分来产生抑光区域，这就制作出了一个可投掷的，生成临时的黑暗云区域的粉末，
astralsorcery.journal.NOC_POWDER.3.text: 该区域会在短时间内根据生物群系的反应生成相应的怪物，无论它们是如何的稀有少见。<NL>这片区域不会影响阳光对怪物的净化效果，因此应注意不要赶走或过早击杀其中的一些怪物。<NL>将多个云区放置的太近或太频繁的在同一个位置释放，会降低怪物的生成几率。无论是由你自己还是投掷器扔出的。
astralsorcery.journal.ILLUMINATOR.1.text: 辉光粉无法应付大范围的区域照明问题。这不仅仅是需要手动部署的问题，还需要亲身进入危险区域。使用由星能驱动的设备来部署光源会好很多。<NL>通过吸收夜间的聚能场或使用其他提升者的照明星杖为装置供能，洞穴照明器可以在8米范围的螺旋形垂直层中提供广阔的照明范围。
astralsorcery.journal.ILLUMINATOR.3.text: 为了防止光源过多的问题，洞穴照明器只会在其下方的洞穴区域放置光源。如果有足够的时间，它将一直照亮到基岩层，并将继续在新出现的空白区域放置光源。<NL>拆除洞穴照明器时光源会保留。毕竟清除光源的工作量很大，因此放置时请注意，以防止照亮不需要的区域。
astralsorcery.journal.ROCK_CRYSTALS.1.te: 由于产生它们的特殊条件，每种新开采的水晶石都是不同的。在尺寸、纯度与可塑性上的差异，都会导致对特定用途的适用性存在相当大的差异。在把它们从岩石层中挖掘出来前，没有如何办法可以确定这些水晶石的具体属性。虽然学院早已认知到对水晶石的修正是利用水晶石的必经之路，但这可不像给一个普通宝石打磨那么简单。
astralsorcery.journal.ROCK_CRYSTALS.2.te: 将水晶石用磨石粗暴的打磨只会造成破坏。因此需要用更优雅的方式对水晶进行§8修正§r。
astralsorcery.journal.CRYSTAL_GROWTH.1.t: 基于内部矩阵基质受星能影响而进行强化重构的原理，将水晶石浸没在星能液中，直到星能液被吸收掉，可以修复或者让水晶石变得更坚固耐用。当发生这种情况时，水晶石的尺寸将增长。但任何水晶石的属性修正与属性数量的修正都有其极限，若不使用专用的工具是无法删除水晶石上的属性的。
astralsorcery.journal.CRYSTAL_GROWTH.2.t: 将两个晶体浸入星能液中会导致属性较少的水晶石被合并到具有更多属性的水晶石中，“较大”的水晶石可能获得被吸收的水晶石的一个或多个属性。水晶石拥有的属性越多，发生这种情况的可能性就越小。
astralsorcery.journal.CUTTING_TOOL.1.tex: 学院文献表明，虽然铁或钢凿子是一种很好的工具，但它仅是物理上的，而引导星能则完全相反，仅是魔法上的。将星辉锭的坚固特性与能量辐射场相结合，可以同时影响两种形态。金可以防止凿头的星能场变形，强化工具。<NL>对工具进行附魔将获得更好的保护，以防产生负面影响。
astralsorcery.journal.CUTTING_TOOL.3.tex: 用工具敲击水晶石，可以分割水晶石以及其属性。新生成的水晶石将各自继承其父代属性的一部分，但这个过程既不均匀也不完美。有时还会导致部分属性消失。<NL>不断的将水晶石和雕凿出的碎片浸没在星能液中，再花费些时间，可以塑造出一个特定用途的水晶石，当然，这需要一些§5运气§r才行。
astralsorcery.journal.node.TOOLS.name: 水晶石工具
astralsorcery.journal.TOOLS.1.text: 尽管特别容易受剪切应力影响，但精心特制的水晶石在导引背景星能时的性能要远远优于金属工具。使用多个水晶石专门制作的普通工具导引背景星能时，可以充分地利用其组成的水晶石所具有的属性并完美发挥出来。用这种方式制作的工具将拥有独特的作用，即使是同一为制作者所制造的工具也有可能因为所使用的水晶石而拥有完全不同的强度与能力。
astralsorcery.journal.TOOLS.3.text: 一些博学多识的提升者甚至可以找到在使用过程中为这些工具提供外部星能的方法，来进一步增强它们的功能，或以其他的方式利用它们的属性。
astralsorcery.journal.node.WELL.name: 聚星缸
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.1.text: 水晶石周围会自然而然的聚集星能，将其放置在高浓度的星能下时，其周围会生成露珠状的星能凝结液。这种液态的星能对于魔法研究上有极大的助益，但正常情况下是无法收集海蓝宝石或水晶石周围自然凝结的微量液体的。需要用一个特制的导引容器来收集与存储星能，以更加快速稳定的方式收集星能液。提供给聚星缸的星能越多，它利用催化剂产生星能液的速度就越快。
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.3.text: 使用鼠标右键将催化剂放入聚星缸后，催化剂将无法取下。催化剂将被周围的星能缓慢降解，并不断生成星能液，直到它完全分解为止。虽然催化剂的使用寿命是不同的，足量的催化剂能产生更多的星能液。对星能敏感的海蓝宝石和水晶石可以产生星能液，但是其他催化剂也可以产生其他液体，比如用下界岩产生熔岩。
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.4.text: 由于其独特的构造限制，即使有外部的星能源进行供能，聚星缸正上方的位置也必须保持露天。从聚星缸的底部可以用抽取液体的泵或管道来提前液体，但无法将液体回流到聚星缸内。<NL>催化剂对星能的感应越强，它产生的液体就越多。水晶石就比海蓝宝石要产生更多的星能液，以更高级的方式强化的催化剂会比其基础形式产生更多的产物。
astralsorcery.journal.WELL.5.text: 星能液在星能合成外也有其他的用途。它的流动速度比水更快，触碰它会获得暂时的夜视能力，它也与其他液体发生交互作用。这种超冷流体会立即冻结与之接触的所有水，并迅速冷却流动的熔岩，以至于形成的是沙子而不是石头。<NL>有时形成沙子时受环境的星能影响生成海蓝宝石砂岩。
astralsorcery.journal.INFUSED_WOOD.1.tex: 作为一种纤维材料，将木材浸泡在星能液中会让星能液被吸入纤维中，使木材浸透并加大其强度。<NL>新产生的这种材料坚韧且富有弹性，特别适合用于引导魔法能量。如果需要更多的魔法感应度，可以在任何星能合成台上进行进一步加工。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR2.name: 星辉祭坛
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR2.1.text: 任何提升者的下一个测试都是升级他的星辉合成台，以允许操纵外部的星能，这是使用星能进入下一阶段的必经之路。通过对合成台进行改造，使用魔法加固并强化相关的大理石，就可以操纵并使用两倍于星辉合成台的星能量。<NL>不过这需要一个支撑结构，以便在§b升级后§r利用这些额外的容量。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR2.4.text: 虽然拥有两倍于星辉合成台的星能容量是不错，但是祭坛的另一个重要特征是需要完整的结构，如果周围的结构不完整，那么内部的星能储存槽将显示为§4红色§r。<NL>如果有足够的星能，并且有足够的原料同时摆放在祭坛上，那么就可以同时制作多个物品。祭坛储存的星能越多，它的合成速度就越快。
astralsorcery.journal.node.SKY_RESO.name: 法斯刻能量
astralsorcery.journal.SKY_RESO.1.text: 星座产生的星能会与其自身的独特频率产生强烈的共鸣。这在操纵某些特定的能量时非常有用，但有时使用者并不在乎星能来自于哪个星座。谢天谢地，百川汇海，万流归宗，星能也不例外。这片星能的海洋被称为法斯刻之域，其从星空中洒落大量的星能。
astralsorcery.journal.SKY_RESO.2.text: 无论如何探究或吸取，没有使用者能够达到法斯刻之域的能量极限。未学习过相关知识的提升者要查看所在位置的星能场能量程度，可以使用星辉合成台内的储存库进行手动测量，这需要带着星辉合成台进行移动。<NL>虽然这个方法的确有效，但效率太低，而且有可能碰上怪物。
astralsorcery.journal.SKY_RESO.3.text: 同样糟糕的方法是直接显示原始法斯刻之域的装置，就如同在海里游泳时寻找水一样。<NL>因此建议仅制造对最高浓度的星能场产生反应的装置。在夜间时将法斯刻共振器举到高处，可以找到法斯刻浓度最高的区域，就像共鸣星杖与水晶石矿石那样。罕见的蓝色云层表明当前区域含有的强烈能量，而这些云中的火花表明了该区域的最高浓度。
astralsorcery.journal.SPEC_RELAY.1.text: 虽然法斯刻共振器可以用于找寻高法斯刻浓度区域，但估计没有提升者想（或者不能）将基础设施迁移来利用这些高浓度区域。对于初学者来说也无法制作自己的聚能水晶，因此扩展星辉祭坛的聚能范围就是唯一的选择了。
astralsorcery.journal.SPEC_RELAY.4.text: 利用小型的大理石结构将附近的法斯刻能量引导到光波增幅器中，将形成一个良好的法斯刻聚能点。用鼠标右键将玻璃透镜插入光波增幅器内，将为收集到的能量提供一个出口。基于光波增幅器的特性，所有距离16米内的星能使用装置都将获得额外的法斯刻能量供应。附近的任何人都能观测到能量传输的过程。
astralsorcery.journal.TELESCOPE.1.text: 望远镜对于初学者来说是个不错的辅助工具，但受限于构造，有着很大的局限。一个更稳定的底座和额外的金色装饰将可以调整和消除冲突的星座光谱，并且可以在任何夜晚内观测天空中的所有星座。额外增加的稳定性将能支持探测暗淡的星座，更不用说明亮级别的了。
astralsorcery.journal.TELESCOPE.3.text: 与它的组成部件望远镜一样，天文望远镜也要求在露天环境下，并且不受建筑物或景观特征的阻碍。<NL>使用观察窗左右两侧的箭头可以将其视角朝向空中出现的8个星座之一。如果测绘时出现错误或者有较大的误差而无法观测星座时，可以调整下镜头的朝向，重新进行星座测绘。
学院支持提升者之间的知识分享行为，因为共享的知识与研究会让所有人受益。由于星能知识的神秘特性，只有以星能反应物质为装裱的卷轴才行。使用者如同亲身经历一般，获得了相应的知识。右键单击以将知识嵌入到卷轴中或从卷轴中学习，或者用 Shift +右击以覆盖卷轴内的知识。
astralsorcery.journal.node.LENS.name: 水晶透镜
astralsorcery.journal.LENS.1.text: 对所有星辉法师来说，操纵与引导聚集星辉的能力是十分重要的。无论是提高聚星缸中催化剂的转化效率，还是提高星辉祭坛的星能利用率，抑或是仅仅只是进行材料转换，有时星能源距离过远，需要直接进行星能供应等等。<NL>在这些情况下，水晶透镜是最佳解决方案。
astralsorcery.journal.LENS.3.text: 在选择用于制作水晶透镜的水晶石时，学院建议使用最高的品质，一旦水晶石中含有的任何瑕疵或缺陷都会影响之后制作的水晶透镜。而这又反而会导致它们在传输星能时造成更大的损耗。使用质量上乘的天体水晶石进行星能折射时可以消除额外产生的损耗，但是在每一个水晶透镜的传输路径上都会产生损耗。
astralsorcery.journal.LENS.4.text: 在星能的法则限制下，一个水晶透镜可以一次性从多个来源和多个角度接收星能，但它一次只能传输到一个位置。水晶透镜的基座使其可以用任何方向连接。<NL>当水晶透镜将星能聚集到目标时，使用链接器调整好水晶透镜的距离与角度，这是准确传输星能的重要一步。
astralsorcery.journal.node.LINKTOOL.name: 链接器
astralsorcery.journal.LINKTOOL.1.text: 没有辅助工具的情况下，魔法能量可不像物理世界那样容易使用。学院的链接器是任何星辉法师控制星能的主要工具之一。利用海蓝宝石的共振特性将聚能水晶的能量导引到目标方块上，可以在两个位置之间形成玄学上的联系，从而进行星能的传输。先右键单击起始源头将位置存储在链接器内，之后的右键选定目标都将以源头为起点进行链接。
astralsorcery.journal.LINKTOOL.3.text: 在目标位置替换为其他方块无需重新链接。用其他物体遮挡星能光线是不会影响星能的传输的，反而会因无法聚集在目标上而产生额外的消耗。将一个源头链接到多个目标将均分星能，因此把多余的链路删除也很重要。要删除单个链接，先选择星能源，之后按住shift时右键单击目标位置即会中断链接。
astralsorcery.journal.LINKTOOL.4.text: 要一次性删除所有链接，按住shift时右键星能源即可。当链接器不再作为活动工具时将断开与选定源的连接，从而能进行新源的选定。被选定的源将不会因空间变换而保留。<NL>任何需要消耗星能的装置都可以链接到聚能水晶来增大星能输入。长距离的链接不需要保持区块加载也能继续传输星能。
将大量的星能聚集到一个位置上，可以对物质进行重构。这也可以用于需要大量星能的星辉祭坛或效应放大仪式。与星辉祭坛不同的是效应放大仪式只能接收与其内的星座一致的星能。
astralsorcery.journal.TRANSMUTATION_ORES: 许多物质都对星辉有着很高的活性反应，将星能聚焦其上时会发生奇妙的转变。将星辉聚能水晶链接到方块上，就能改变其内部构造。<NL>这其中最有用的就是制作星辉矿石了，但除此之外学院也记录了其他有效的转化，比如沙子变粘土，钻石矿变绿宝石矿，南瓜变蛋糕等。此页面的图标将循环显示源方块。
astralsorcery.journal.STARMETAL_ORE.1.te: 星辉锭是任何星辉法师都需要的最重要的金属之一，但它并非自然生成的。为铁矿石注入大量的星能，迫使金属的原子结构重组，就像制造磁铁一样。这种魔改矿石可以像铁一样熔炼成星辉金属锭，这种锭会不断的散发出微弱的星能场，对于高级提升者来说是至关重要的。
astralsorcery.journal.node.STARDUST.name: 星尘
astralsorcery.journal.STARDUST.1.text: 虽然星辉金属在导引星能上有广泛的应用，但比起星辉锭制作的星尘来还是有不小的差距。金属内蕴含的强大星能，让金属兼具了刚性和柔韧性。虽然它可以直接承受冲击而不产生形变，但若是尝试对金属进行研磨或切割会让金属变得像面团一样变形。因此必须抑制金属内的星能量才能制作星尘，学院的星辉锭切削工具就是为此而准备的。
astralsorcery.journal.STARDUST.2.text: 用切削工具快速敲击一个星辉金属锭，对物理形体与星能量场的强烈冲击导致其失去稳性，迅速破碎为星尘。<NL>为了完成这个目的所需的速度与力量并非合成台所能提供的，因此必须在现实中完成。这项技能在今后的学习中会频繁的使用，应多加练习。
astralsorcery.journal.RESONATOR_AREA_SIZ: 在法斯刻之域内搜寻高浓度星能场是有用的，但对于部分提升者来说，查看星能的适应范围也是刚需。在法斯刻共振器上添加特殊的玻璃透镜、辉光粉和星尘，右键点击仪式基座时将显示自然星能受干扰的范围。<NL>Shift右键将使共振器在法斯刻和多米刻模式间循环切换。
很少有星辉法师能在基地附近找到需要的所有资源。对于大多数原材料，甚至是来自其他维度的材料，都要经历浓缩提纯的过程。因此即使是学院的初学者也迫切需要有一个安全可靠的，可扩展的安全旅行方式。天体星门网络降低了跨维度旅行的难度，并且星门本身可以使用铁砧命名。
站在星门上时可以看到对面的景象，不同的星门将像星星一样显化在闪烁的虚空中。星门的位置是相对的，其他维度的星门将显示在更高的位置。选定星门后按住shift或右键单击将进行传送。<NL>同一区域内的星门过多会导致某些星门无法显示。
不受限的进入星门是有风险的。可以使用海蓝宝石右键天体星门，将星门设置为私有，若想移除私有限制只要按住shift空手右键即可。可以使用链接器将星门与玩家链接来扩展访问权限。<NL>站在私有星门上时会显示所有访问者的名字与个人星座在白色的大理石圈上。右键点击相应的个人星座将取消对应玩家的访问权限。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR3.name: 天辉祭坛
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR3.1.text: 基于星尘特有的引光特性，可以对星辉祭坛进行再度改进强化。额外加入海蓝宝石、大理石以及另一种用星辉锭与星尘改进的天体水晶，这对祭坛的提升远非先前能比。<NL>完成这一步后证明提升者的研究进入了下一个维度，并且下一步所需的学习资源也开放使用。
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR3.4.text: 祭坛升级后拥有更强大的星能引导力，这导致现有的支撑结构无法提供足够的星能，必须使用更多的熏黑大理石以及更庞大的支撑结构。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.1.text: 对于常规合成来说直接使用全频段星能就足够了，但某些特殊情况下，更适合使用特定星座的频段的星能。优秀的星辉法师都必须了解特定星座的星能所具有的独特效果，并能够熟练的将其应用于之后学院的关键研究中。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.2.text: 任何能够过滤多余星能频率的结构都需要很大的覆盖面积。熏黑大理石所具有的星能吸收特性在过滤特定星座的星能上有极大的助益。将光波增幅器放置在熏黑大理石上，可以将选定的星能利用共振的方式从大理石引入，而不用造成能量损耗。中央的祭坛也能做为中继器使用。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.4.text: 将光波增幅器按星座的外形进行摆放，可以固定其星座的图案，从而使星能与祭坛上方的物品进行共鸣。在晚上时，手持星图，熏黑大理石内储存的密集星能会产生对应的反应，显示出与星图相匹配准确的星座共振点。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PLAYER.6.text: 当光波增幅器与星座对齐形成共振后，在大理石表面上方的光波增幅器之间形成蓝色星能束绘制成星座，任何处于祭坛中心位置的物或人都将被过滤后的星能轰击。这会将目标内部的所有星能强制与特定星座进行共鸣。<NL>只有经过星能共鸣，提升者才能认知到除5个明亮级别以外的星座。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.1.text: 就像水晶石一样，对体内的星能进行适当的引导可以强化人体。虽然可以将星能聚集来使用某些魔法能力，但最初的共鸣选择将影响达到目标所需花费的精力，而且共鸣能量必须经过一定程度的"锻炼"才行<NL>人体只能与明亮级别的星座共鸣。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.2.text: 控制引导这些内在的能量需要集中精神进行，但这超出了大部分星辉法师的能力范围。为了解决这一问题，学院在宝典内添加了相关的能力页面，以辅助提升者对技能点的可用数量及技能的数据可视化。<NL>这些内容可以在宝典的"星能力"页面下看到。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.3.text: 以不同的方式使用这些星能点将产生不同的影响。唯一可惜的是，由于星座烙印是唯一的，无法单纯将已使用的某个星能点恢复，虽然有一些方式可以对技能进行封禁（本书后面有详细说明）。要清除已使用的星能点，必须从其根本开始，打断与星座的共鸣能量。将共鸣打断后需要重新与星座进行共鸣，并且能力也需要重新锻炼。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS.4.text: 内部星能一共有三种级别的强化。<NL>增加/减少-在基础能力上增加一个固定值。<NL>增强/削弱-先将值求和，在增加/减少的值应用后在加上相应的值。<NL>更多/更少-这些值不进行求和，而是在增强/削弱的值应用后额外附加。
astralsorcery.journal.SHIFT_STAR.1.text: 共鸣之后是无法轻易消除的，早期的解决方式就是使用更替之星来中断链接。这种人造晶体产生的振动频率可以覆盖掉使用者的星座共振频率，将其拿在手中时，右键一段时间直到它破碎消失，并覆盖你的个人星座共振频率，并且更替之星会被消耗。<NL>这种消除方式会废除掉之前所有的努力，并且需要重新进行星座共鸣。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERKS_SEAL.1.t: 有时可能有部分能力是不需要的，但又必须经由此能力获得更深入的进阶能力，或可能是偶尔使用该能力。与其使用更替之星来打断与重置所有技能，不如直接在身上使用封禁印章来封禁单个能力，这样不会对其他能力造成影响。可以直接将背包内的封禁印章拖动到技能树上的技能点上，松开后，封禁印章将刻入到身体上，其将覆盖技能的共振频率。双击封禁印章将破坏封印。封禁印章的使用数量没有限制。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERK_GEMS.1.te: 水晶石及其衍生物在聚集星能上有卓越的性能，但在储存星能上却恰恰相反。在水晶石的外部使用内反射涂层，虽然星能仍然会逐渐流逝，但可以大大减少流逝的量。<NL>将水晶石与辉光粉投入星能液中，最终会产生一个小型的水晶簇。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERK_GEMS.2.te: 一旦它通过多个阶段缓慢成长为更大的闪光水晶簇后，就可以收获了。由此产生的宝石会对附近的星能产生特殊反应，手持宝石时能感觉到体内流动的星能。水晶簇生长所消耗的时间将影响活力宝石的类型，白天，夜晚，黎明和黄昏。在白天进入生长阶段的宝石效果比夜晚的更弱，但拥有更多的效果。一旦生长完成，活力宝石会根据一天中的时间不断变化：白天生长的伊利姆宝石，其附魔效果通常较弱，但数量更多。在晚上的时间生长的奥瑞尔宝石和芙荙姆宝石，在它们的属性上往往具有更强效果。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_PERK_GEMS.3.te: 一旦完全成长，这些水晶簇有时可能会退化为未成长的状态。<NL>宝石的附魔强化数量为2-4左右。用利用宝石的力量，需要使用宝石镶嵌槽。这些特制的宝石镶嵌槽可以利用宝石的力量。<NL>拥有镶嵌槽后，可以点击槽位选择一个活力宝石嵌入，嵌入后将获得相应宝石的加成能力。从镶嵌槽中取出宝石后宝石会放入背包，以便于用其他宝石替换或者将槽位留空。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CRYSTAL.1.text: 制作聚能水晶的最重要的一步就是调制共振水晶石，让水晶石与特定星座的频率进行共振，这样就不受其他星座的星能频率影响，如鹅泅水,片羽不湿。<NL>这种特制的共振水晶石若是作为聚星缸的催化剂，那么星能液的产出速度将大大提高，但这只是一种过渡材料，还需要提升者进行更进一步的精制。
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CRYSTAL.2.text: 与其他的水晶石一样，也可以使用星辉锭切削工具来分割共振水晶石，但切割过的水晶石却不一定是共振水晶石。<NL>一旦共振完成，水晶石无法在保持完整的情况下更换共振频率，并且学院所提供的标准共鸣祭坛上也有相应的安全保护措施防止此情况发生。
astralsorcery.journal.RIT_PEDESTAL.1.tex: 如果对特定的星能进行充分的收集和过滤，那可以对附近的环境产生相应的星座效应。将共振水晶石放入效应放大器内，将特定星座的星能纯化后放大其星座效应。若当天没有该星座也可以使用其他同星座的聚能水晶提高效应放大器的效率。
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.1.text: 效应放大器在聚集星能方面不如聚能水晶。将聚能水晶链接到效应放大器上，只要与放大器内的共振水晶石同源星座就行。效应放大是如何实现的呢，这些额外的星能并非直接进行效应放大，而是提供给效应放大器，由其进行控制。
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.2.text: 随着为效应放大提供的星能增加，将需要对效应放大进行平衡以提高其速度。效应放大器会在不平衡时发射出许多星能束，在每束光的末端放置一个透镜，并将星能束反射回效应放大器进行能量平衡。反射最多5次，此后，无论反射了多少星能，效应放大器将始终维持平衡。
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.3.text: 效应放大的运行速度取决于提供的星能量。如果移除或更换效应放大器内的共振水晶石，那些平衡透镜的位置也不需要更改，除非共振水晶石的星座也进行了更换。<NL>如果附近锚定了一个效应重定向通道，那么效应放大器将自动把平衡能量从透镜上映射到锚定点上，并会释放出绚丽的星能辐射。
astralsorcery.journal.PED_ACCEL.4.text: 虽然学院无法测量出任何放大效应的最高运行速度，但效应放大是有极限的。当效应放大器处于能量平衡状态时，继续加速其速度可能会导致共振水晶受到破裂应力，使部分水晶断裂并降低相应的属性。
astralsorcery.journal.QUICK_CHARGE.1.tex: 稍有常识的提升者都了解建筑结构中的星能场远比法斯刻之域内的星能场要集中。所有的星能中至少包含一个星座投影，以及星辉法师的本体。<NL>充能可以自动为相应的装置进行供能。当然充能的消耗不可一概而论，但是提升者持有相应的星能用具时能够确定需要消耗的大致星能量。
astralsorcery.journal.QUICK_CHARGE.2.tex: 虽然其内部星能储存量较小，但它会自行从附近的环境中重新充能，从而可以在分散使用的情况下继续为需要的工具进行充能，尤其是在夜空下。<NL>有些效果可能需要的星能超过单次容纳的上限，并且需要对一个星座进行 §1共鸣§r 才能扩展其内部星能储存，这甚至会影响到其内部星能恢复速度。
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_CHANNEL.1.tex: 尽管学院仍然未发现发现任何迹象表明星辉法师可以直接引导自然存在的星能，但通过特制的工具，几乎所有提升者都能轻松使用星能来达到特殊效果。常见的用途比如用照明星杖产生耀斑，给水晶石工具充能，飞行以及对星斗披风进行强化等。许多提升者都发觉在构建许多强化结构时十分有帮助。
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_CHANNEL.2.tex: 它们有两种建筑专用星杖：转位星杖和建筑星杖
astralsorcery.journal.TRAVERSAL_WAND.1.t: 越空星杖有两种使用方式。冲驰模式下可以使用星杖进行蓄力，释放时会向视角朝向方向释放蓄力相同力度的冲刺。在闪现模式下，激活后星杖会直接将你传送到目标位置。但需要注意的是，仔细查看目标附近的环境，避免掉入深渊。
astralsorcery.journal.GRAPPLE_WAND.1.tex: 冲击星杖就是魔法版的钩爪，向目标位置发射一束星能钩爪。一旦与目标连接成功，它将阻止使用者的任何现有移动，并将其立刻拉到目标位置。该星杖具有内部充能设置，需要充能后才能再次使用，除非进行额外的再充能。
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_WANDS.1.text: 转位星杖和建筑星杖类似，都可以通过shift右键方块进行标记，并自动使用背包内的库存。<NL>转位星杖可以在空中shift右键来改变替换的区域大小。如果背包内有足够的数量也可以一次替换多个方块，设置完后将根据列表进行随机替换。
astralsorcery.journal.TOOL_WANDS.3.text: 建筑星杖有多种放置方式，默认模式是朝向玩家的直线。其他模式包括从玩家发出的直线，水平面，垂直面，球体以及空心球体。它们的大小是固定的。<NL>植物法师也可以使用自己的法杖利用魔力直接为这些星杖提供方块。
astralsorcery.journal.LENSES_EFFECTS.1.t: Filtration of Starlight magic is accomplished by Constellation Attunement, but filtering the energy isn't the only way to change its magical effects. By using aligned ingredients to dope a glass lens, Starlight passed through the lens will be twisted to only a specific aspect of the light, regardless of which constellation to which it belongs. <NL>Because this light is not limited to a specific constellation, explicit focus of the energy does not matter, and simply being bathed in the light will see a magical effect applied.
astralsorcery.journal.LENSES_EFFECTS.2.t: Affixing one of these colored lenses to a Crystal Lens array will filter any light sent through it. Unfortunately, shifting the spectrum of the magical energy with one of these lenses will not persist through another lens or prism, which will disperse the magical frequency shift and bring it back to normal. If the effect is desired through multiple crystal lenses in a chain, a colored lens would need to be applied to each Crystal Lens in the chain.
astralsorcery.journal.IGNITION_LENS.1.te: The beam from an Ignition Lens heats things up until they catch on fire. Creatures will burn under the flames, and items dropped or blocks placed in its path are smelted down as though subjected to a furnace. <NL>The rate of ignition is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.BREAK_LENS.1.text: The beam of a Break Lens breaks any blocks placed into its path, except those that cannot be broken such as Illuminated blocks and bedrock. <NL>How quickly a placed block is broken is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.DAMAGE_LENS.1.text: Creatures in the beam from a Harm Lens will periodically take damage as though struck by a sword. <NL>The rate at which damage is dealt depends on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.PUSH_LENS.1.text: The beam of a Push Lens applies a constant force away from the lens to both items and creatures in its path. An icy path can accelerate how quickly an affected object or creature is moved. <NL>The frequency of the pushing effect is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
The beam of a Regeneration Lens encourages rapid regeneration of injuries. <NL>How frequently this healing is applied depends on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.GROWTH_LENS.1.text: The beam from a Growth lens subjects any plants in its path to rapid growth, as though by fertilizer or by any other method that would cause the plant to grow. <NL>How often a plant is forced to grow is based on how much Starlight is passing through the lens.
astralsorcery.journal.SPECTRAL_LENS.1.te: There are times when operating under an open sky isn't possible, and the safety of the underground or behind a closed door is needed. Starlight transmission through glass can solve some of these problems, but sometimes this is not possible. The modulation of a Spectral Lens allows collected Starlight to transmit through solid blocks, though this subjects the stream of Starlight to small losses.
astralsorcery.journal.node.INFUSER.name: 星能聚合器
astralsorcery.journal.INFUSER.1.text: Increasing the reactivity of materials to Starlight energy is necessary in many cases. The Academy recognizes only a few materials that are receptive to simply submerging them into Liquid Starlight. Arcane fluid Infusion is needed to transmute many objects into what the Academy considers their more "natural" states than applying magical spectra directly allows. This is more temperamental than Attunement or Starlight Transmutation. Liquid Starlight is a sufficiently meterable source of magical energy, but needs a more balanced introduction to the target material.
astralsorcery.journal.INFUSER.3.text: By drawing from the structure's Liquid Starlight reservoir, no sky access is required for a Starlight Infuser to work. The more volatile storage method of the liquid magic does mean partial losses of the liquid may be common when agitation is introduced during the Infusion process. The lost liquid must be replaced before the Infuser will allow subsequent activation for safety. Using a Resonating Wand will activate the Starlight Infuser much like other Starlight crafting devices. <NL>The Academy has blocked these devices infusing creatures on ethical grounds.
astralsorcery.journal.ENCHANTMENT_AMULET: Shifting Stars normally resonate in chaotic and strange patterns, which allow them to disrupt personal attunements. This chaos can be halted when exposed to specially filtered Starlight. With the emanating power no longer constantly in flux, a more focused benefit can be achieved.<NL>Directing these energies into an Eye of Ender causes them to softly radiate and diffuse outwards a short distance, interacting with existing magical fields worn or held.

While worn, a Resplendent Prism adds or empowers magical effects applied to the rest of the wearer's equipment. Controlling this empowerment is not possible, and the effect is based entirely on the magical frequency the Shifting Star was locked into.<NL>Re-exposing a Resplendent Prism to filtered Starlight momentarily releases the frequency lock, with the uncontrollable chaos of the Shifting Star determining the magical results when it becomes set again.
astralsorcery.journal.RITUAL_LINK.1.text: The supporting structure for a Ritual Pedestal takes up considerable space, an unfortunate necessity to channel Starlight into a magical ritual. The Academy has devised a way to relocate the epicenter of the magical emanations from a ritual pedestal using a combination of linked anchors. By placing one anchor five meters above the pedestal, a Linking Tool can connect it to another anchor placed anywhere else in the same dimension. This will cause the linked Anchor to function as the source of the effects, centering the magical ritual on itself.
Rather than drawing the passive Starlight power from glowstone and aquamarine or from the latent Fosic field, personal Attunement Charge can be used to create illuminating sparks when properly channeled. By combining dye with an Illumination Wand, the color of the spark can be changed. Channeling Charge into a Cave Illuminator through this wand will also provide the Illuminator with enough energy to run without nighttime Fosic strength or access to the sky for 10 seconds. When a Cave Illuminator is powered in this fashion, it will start placing sparks matching the wand's color.

Performing a shift-right-click on a block will channel enough Charge energy into the block to bridge the gap between the magically ethereal, and the real world. This will cause the block to take on the appearance of an ethereal ghost, tinted the color of the wand. By bridging existence in this fashion, the block is placed into ethereal stasis and will be totally unbreakable just like bedrock, until shift-right-clicked again to bring it back fully into the real world, making it breakable again. Any Illumination Wand can remove a block from this state, not only the one used to Illuminate it.
astralsorcery.journal.CHARGED_TOOLS.1.te: As crystalline tools already rely heavily on channeling passive Starlight for their function, they behave differently when Infused. Rather than transmuting their physical form, they instead have the natural magical pathways inside the crystals reinforced, allowing for far more direct and obvious magical effects when supplied with magic. Feeding these tools with the natural Starlight Charge of the wielder will manifest this magic, but this will apply stresses to the crystals that require a "cooldown" period before the process is repeated. Over time, the tool will
astralsorcery.journal.CHARGED_TOOLS.2.te: dissipate its own Infusion and require a redo. <NL>The magic manifested by this Charge energy relates directly to how the crystals were shaped in crafting the tool. Axes can harvest many connected parts of the struck tree at once, pickaxes can ethereally detect nearby ores, shovels can dig a broader hole at once, and swords will unleash a blast of magical energy on impact that causes other nearby foes to also be injured.
astralsorcery.journal.TREEBEACON.1.text: Living matter is more receptive to Starlight than non-living matter, and new growth even more so. This is shown most-readily with plants, and the most reactive are those that grow the largest: trees. By tapping into that natural reactivity with a specially crafted beacon, a snapshot of the essence of the tree can be captured at the moment it grows from a sapling, expending the growth into an ethereal construct exemplifying the essence of that sapling. The sapling itself will be consumed to fuel the creation of this echo. By passing captured Starlight through this
astralsorcery.journal.TREEBEACON.3.text: echo, it may be extruded into real products of that tree. <NL>In this way, far more resources can be created magically from this echo than if the real tree were to be harvested. Focusing Starlight into this beacon will accelerate how quickly the resources are generated, with light from Aevitas providing the most benefit. Foliage is least likely to be generated by the beacon, as it is furthest from the essence of each tree. <NL>While each beacon can support multiple echoes, each echo has a limited lifespan and will eventually break down, requiring the planting of a new sapling.
astralsorcery.journal.node.PRISM.name: 水晶棱镜
astralsorcery.journal.PRISM.1.text: While crystal lenses form the backbone of any distributed Starlight network, they can only transmit to a single location at once, which limits possibilities. The Crystal Prism solves this, though at a much greater material cost. The same principles behind crafting Crystal Lenses apply here, with the crystal used as the heart of the prism dictating the transmissive qualities of the prism. A crystal prism will evenly distribute and Starlight it received from a collector to all its target links.
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.1.te: Enchanting through bulk communal knowledge is a somewhat inexact process. By leveraging the properties of constellations and the focus of Starlight, more powerful enchantment combinations than may be normally available becomes a possibility. <NL>Specially etched panes of glass are needed for this process. <NL>Up to three constellations at a time may be leveraged with the Stellar Refraction Table, assuming all are in the sky at once.
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.3.te: Placement of the constellations for tracing is important, as interference from lines crossing other constellations will reduce the overall strength. Overlapping individual stars is recommended when possible for maximum effect. <NL>Starlight-reactive Parchment is needed to perform the tracing that will guide the etching of the subsequently prepared glass. <NL>The Academy warns that repeating the use of a single constellation on the same Parchment or etching will not improve the end result, and due to interference among all tracings, may actually hamper the outcome.
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.4.te: Once an Etched Infused Glass is created, it may be used to directly enchant an unenchanted piece of equipment or book, if all the constellations on the glass are in the sky. <NL>Using this method, normally antithetical enchantments may be placed alongside each other on the enchanted item, and the resulting enchanted item may be more powerful than could be normally created. Books enchanted this way may not be able to have their full power placed onto an item.
astralsorcery.journal.DRAWING_TABLE.6.te: The essence of the enchantment may also be instilled into a bottle of water, or a mundane, thick, or awkward potion to create Stardew - a magical beverage that provides various effects to the imbiber for a short period of time, depending on the constellations leveraged.
astralsorcery.journal.node.ALTAR4.name: 五彩祭坛
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR4.1.text: The final test for any initiate to graduate the Academy as an Astral Sorcerer is to complete construction of an Iridescent Altar - the most advanced method of Starlight Crafting presently known. Brute force will only succeed for so long with magic before a more deft hand is needed to prevent disaster. <NL>By filtering received Starlight through an Attuned Crystal socketed into the altar, the influence of only a single constellation can be applied to the crafted item without risking a rapid and catastrophic unplanned disassembly.
astralsorcery.journal.ALTAR4.4.text: To make the most use of this approach to filtered magic, Astral Relays can be placed on any sooty marble of the altar structure. They will allow for specific items to be placed during the crafting process when requested by the altar, so their essence may be infused into the crafted item. <NL>These items will show in the crafting recipe as orbiting the outside of the crafting grid, and any required Crystal Attunement will be shown in the background of the recipe.
astralsorcery.journal.COLL_CRYSTAL.1.tex: Attuned Rock Crystals serve as good filters for Starlight, but only have the same receptivity as any other block. By using a Celestial Altar to apply a coating of several substances that are more receptive to Starlight, this receptivity can be greatly enhanced. The Collector Crystal crafted in this fashion will gather all Starlight within 8 meters of itself, discarding the light that does not match its Attunement.
astralsorcery.journal.COLL_CRYSTAL.3.tex: These Crystals operate like the ones in the Academy-provided study temples and can be used in the same fashion, but with the ability to move them for convenience. Due to the reach of each crystal, placing them too close together will see diminishing returns in total gathered Starlight. <NL>For best performance, care should be taken in selecting the qualities of the crystal used to craft these Collectors, as once crafted, they cannot be changed.
astralsorcery.journal.COLL_CRYSTAL.4.tex: Furthermore, the Academy warns that using unorthodox methods of moving Collector Crystals other than breaking and placing, such as cardboard boxes, may cripple their magical field, leading to unprecedented effects on the efflux of Starlight.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTAL_GROW.1: Studies into the internal structure of Rock Crystals show that there are limits to how large they can grow along with limits to their qualities. Purified iron is weaker than when adding some carbon to make steel, and in the same fashion Rock Crystals need an introduced impurity to alter their internal structure for superior performance. <NL>Stardust is this impurity, but a magical crucible is needed to bring this change to bloom, though it is a two-step process.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTAL_GROW.2: Submerging a Rock Crystal into a bucket of Liquid Starlight with a handful of Stardust will see a rapid boil occur in the mixture. Once the Liquid Starlight and excess Stardust have boiled off, what remains will be a small crystal cluster. Exposure to Starlight from the sky above or from a linked Collector Crystal will result in this crystal cluster changing its internal structure, growing over time in several stages. <NL>Harvesting the cluster will see more attributes on the resulting crystal than it started with.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTAL_GROW.3: A crystal cluster that is ready for harvest will shimmer with light.<NL> It is recommended to have the cluster grow on a block of Starmetal Ore for several reasons. The magical radiation of the ore will generate sympathetic magical eddies in the crystal that accelerate the growth process, though each stage of growth will disrupt the ore's magical field sufficiently to revert it to iron ore. The Academy recommends having a nearby Collector to transmute the ore again each time this occurs.
astralsorcery.journal.CEL_CRYSTALS.1.tex: Celestial-class crystals are superior in every single quality to a normal Rock Crystal, and can be easily identified by their brilliant blue color resulting from the inclusion of Stardust. <NL>In any instance where a Rock Crystal could be used, a Celestial Crystal could be substituted, including the creation of Crystal Clusters with slightly different attributes. Some advanced applications require the superior structure of a Celestial Crystal.
astralsorcery.journal.ENHANCED_COLLECTOR: Celestial Crystals create superior Celestial Collector Crystals, but the wax and wane of a constellation over the world do not change. Celestial Collector Crystals can be supported by a structure that evens out the ebb and flow of this energy. While the Collector won't provide as much Starlight when its constellation is in the sky, it will provide much more when its constellation is not in the sky, allowing Rituals and Transmutations to run when they otherwise would be greatly slowed.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_TRAIT.1.text: The light from Faint-class constellations is insufficient to fuel rituals or fully Attune a crystal, but it is sufficient for enchanting items or creating Stardew. The spectrum of their energies is also sufficient to alter a crystal's Attunement subtly. Setting relays in the proper form for these constellations on an Attunement Altar allows an already Attuned crystal to have a single Trait applied that modulates its channeling of Starlight.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_TRAIT.2.text: Once a trait has been applied to an Attuned crystal, it cannot be changed. <NL>Collectors crafted from a crystal with a Trait will retain the trait, but it will have no effect on the Starlight filtered. <NL>Additional information about the effect of each of these Traits has been added to the Faint constellations in the Constellations tab.
astralsorcery.journal.OBSERVATORY.1.text: To increase visual reach into the stars, more filtered lenses and reactive powders will be needed than the Telescope required. The more sensitive viewing an Observatory offers allows a Sorcerer to delve deep into the skyfield, following the slightest hint of magical energies back to its source constellation. <NL>In the deep depths of the Astral, more constellations faintly shine their magical power forth, barely distinguishable against the background noise of existence.
astralsorcery.journal.OBSERVATORY.3.text: As the Observatory is very precise, moving the mouse is necessary to aim around the night sky. When a prospective constellation is located, holding shift will lock the view, allowing the constellation to be traced. Press Right-click/Esc to leave the Observatory view, and dismount the observatory's seat by pressing shift.
Shifting Stars are well suited to brute-force disruption of a personal Attunement, but more refined methods exist. <NL>Filtering the light used for crafting and adding aspects from items allows an advanced Star to be crafted that modulates Attunement energies instead of disrupting them to failure. The Attunement root will shift to match the Irradiant Star, and all perk points will be deallocated, but any growth progress will not be reverted. This allows the sorcerer to re-allocate those points without losing any.
astralsorcery.journal.CRAFTING_FOCUS_HIN: With the successful crafting of the Iridescent Altar, the Academy would like to welcome you as a fully-fledged Astral Sorcerer. New horizons now await your own independent studies. The safety measures previously enforced through your bond with the Academy's library through this Tome have now been removed. Additionally, previously forbidden knowledge is also now available within your Tome as a result of post-graduate contributions to the Academy's knowledge stores.

Attempting to craft with the Iridescent Altar will no longer cancel and fail if the available amount of Starlight drops below the minimum needed to complete the craft, such as falling Starlight levels during dawn. The crafting will be held in stasis at the Altar until the amount of available Starlight returns to the minimum level, regardless of method. <NL>Replacement or additional constellation papers may also now be crafted.

The most dangerous portion of the unlocked knowledge includes the ability to discover the Faint classification of constellations through Constellation Papers, though an Observatory will be needed to see them in the sky. The Academy would recommend caution when working with Faint constellations, as their influence can greatly change the expected results of a previously well-known astral mechanic. <NL>-The Faculty and Staff of the Academy of the Astral.
astralsorcery.journal.node.ATT_CAPE.name: 星斗披风
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CAPE.1.text: Many magical and technical marvels exist in the realm of personal protection, but none channel the power of the stars. By deeply impregnating leather armor with Stardust and Resonating Gems, it is transmuted to a mantle of leather and metal that both protects the wearer, and allows for channeling Charge.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CAPE.3.text: Due to the magical sensitivity of a Mantle, it's highly receptive to enchanting. <NL>The receptivity to channeling Starlight means a Mantle cannot be Attuned via Attunement Altar, but instead requires a special crafting operation to attune it to a constellation. <NL>The Mantle cannot be damaged or torn, lest it may not be used in an alignment recipe.
astralsorcery.journal.ATT_CAPE.4.text: A Mantle may only be aligned to one constellation at a time. Using an already aligned Mantle in another constellation's alignment recipe will change the alignment of the Mantle. <NL>Mantles may be repaired on a mundane anvil using Stardust as an ingredient. <NL>Alignment recipes are located on each constellation's Tome page.
astralsorcery.journal.C_CHALICE.1.text: The largest drawback of a Lightwell is the reservoir size. While sufficient for generating liquids from a catalyst, the required design becomes prohibitively large when scaled up for greater storage. Pipes that can draw liquid from below the Lightwell may not be available, or the environment may not support their use. <NL>Magical teleportation and containment of the fluid is a good solution.
astralsorcery.journal.C_CHALICE.3.text: Using Resonating Gems to keep the contents under high compression results in 64 buckets of storage in a small space. This also means that relocating a Chalice without first removing the stored fluid will result in the fluid being dispersed into the ether.<NL>The Chalice is able to draw Liquid Starlight through the ether from Lightwells within 16 blocks of its line of sight. Like the Lightwell, a Chalice can be connected to pipes from the bottom face.
astralsorcery.journal.C_CHALICE.4.text: As the Chalice facilitates magical transport from Lightwells, the essence of any fluid contained within may leak, seeking out other fluidic essences to merge with. This results in the creation of materials as though the two fluids had met in the world, though very slight dissipation of the stored fluid can occur when this happens. <NL>A redstone signal will tighten the Chalice's compression field, disallowing these effects from happening.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_CORE.1.text: Liquid Starlight may store Starlight energy in a condensed and manageable form, but it is easy to unleash that same power again. Through the use of a magical centrifuge, a chaotic fountain of Starlight can be spun up for times when raw brute magical force are needed to accomplish a goal. <NL>The containment ring of an Evershifting Fountain serves as a stable focus for these energies, and any blocks left within the structure are likely to be destroyed
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_CORE.3.text: No view of the sky is needed to operate this device, as it is operated by an internal storage reservoir of Liquid Starlight. Safely feeding Liquid Starlight into this reservoir is performed by placing a Chalice directly on top of the Fountain. <NL>The desired magic must first be §5Primed§r for this power to have any effect.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_LIQUID.1: Eons of fluidic essence trickling into the void from above bedrock means there are vast, untapped oceans of fluid ripe for retrieval. Using the affinity of Octans for this fluidic essence allows this Prime to draw it to the surface. <NL>Powering a Neromantic Prime will result in a highly destructive bore comprised of Starlight energy burning a hole down to bedrock, at which point the energy reacts with the bedrock to reach into the fluidic essence oceans in the ethereal below, dragging it back to the Fountain.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_LIQUID.3: Retrieval of liquids harvested in this way requires an empty Chalice on the line of sight of the Fountain. <NL>Since the majority of fluidic essence available is water, when other reservoirs of essence in the area are exhausted by the Prime, water essence will fill the gap left behind. <NL>An §1Ichosic Resonator§r should be used to scout for fluid essence pooling in advance.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_LIQUID.4: 由于无法确定地下到底蕴藏的是哪种流体精华，厌倦了不断的转移万象泉结构的行为，还为了节约珍贵的星能液资源。为此对法斯刻共振器进行了修改，让其拥有对大面积区域的流体信息采样的能力。<NL>改进型的艾克斯共振器仍然只能在夜间使用，它借用了共振宝石的力量与流体进行共鸣。新的艾克斯共振器和旧的法斯刻共振器可以通过shift右键切换模式。
astralsorcery.journal.node.ICHOSIC.name: 艾克斯共振器
astralsorcery.journal.ICHOSIC.1.text: Moving a Neromantic Prime Fountain structure constantly to determine what fluidic essence lies below is wasteful of effort and time. With some minor changes, the Fosic Resonator can be used to sample this information instead. Leveraging Resonating Gems and Stardust, holding the Ichosic Resonator at night will draw forth plumes of fluidic essence. <NL>Shifting modes between Fosic and Ichosic can be accomplished by shift-right-clicking.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_VORTEX.1: Tapping Vicio for movement allows this Prime to draw close any creatures nearby, trapping them in a vortical current of kinetic Starlight. The trapped creatures remain unable to act or defend themselves while so trapped, for as long as the Fountain has enough Liquid Starlight. <NL>The cost in Starlight to restrain a creature is influenced by the strength of that creature to fight against the vortical currents.
astralsorcery.journal.BORE_HEAD_VORTEX.3: Even mythical creatures are capable of being held by this Prime, though it seems to require its full and focused power to do so. These creatures require more Starlight power than a Chalice is able to consistently feed into a Fountain over time. Certain powerful creatures, like the Wither or Ender Dragon, may only be contained until the internal reservoir runs dry.
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.removalinfo: §c此合成已在当前的整合包内移除！请通过其他信息来源查找合成方式！
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.constellati: 需要与 %s 星座进行聚焦
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.infusion.mu: Can consume more than one liquid pool
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.infusion.no: Will not accept Liquid Starlight from a chalice
astralsorcery.journal.recipe.infusion.co: Copies NBT data from the input to the output
crystal.property.astralsorcery.size.name: 尺寸
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.des: Light from this constellation penetrates, piercing to the heart of both materials and creatures alike.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.enc: This constellation saturates potions to grant heavily increased strength to the imbiber. Weapons may be enchanted with great Power, Sharpness, and can encourage tridents to Channel storms.<NL>An enchanted weapon's overall damage may also be increased. Armor enchanted by Discidia may increase critical hit chance.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.rit: Dispersing of this light into small discordant energies in the area creates a damaging field, lashing out at all enemies nearby. The intensity increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.man: Once infused with this Constellation's light, a mantle will draw strength from your enemies' blows, empowering your own against them. The wearer gains the same amount of damage most recently taken as additional damage channeled into each hit.
astralsorcery.constellation.discidia.cor: An offensive weapon empowers foes. Allies will find themselves wounded, and enemies will be suffused with both Regeneration and Resistance.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.descr: A repulsive force comes from the light of this constellation, similar to a shield or protective barrier.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.encha: This constellation saturates potions to grant Resistance to harm. Armor may have heavy magical Protection enchanted onto it.<NL>Armor may also be thickened beyond its normal magical improvements. Weapons enchanted may improve a wielder's ability to dodge incoming blows.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.ritua: Dispersing this light into a protective barrier reflects projectiles, pushes mobs outside its reach, and makes allies more resilient to damage. The frequency increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.mantl: A mantle infused with this Constellation's light will draw from the wearer to slowly store up to three magical charges over a minute, each fully negating one damaging blow.
astralsorcery.constellation.armara.corru: Protection is turned to assault, with previously repelled creatures now empowered in Speed, Strength, and Resistance.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.descri: Bathing in the rays of this constellation gives the appearance that everything is moving slower, when it simply makes you faster in whatever you do.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.enchan: This constellation saturates potions to grant greatly increased movement speed. Boots can be enchanted to reduce falling damage, and tridents can Riptide the user out of water, launching them far away.<NL>Weapon attack speed may be increased, and boots may hasten movement.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.ritual: The light of this constellation bestows flight within its area. The maximum reach and frequency of flight refresh greatly increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.mantle: This mantle alignment grants the wearer ethereal wings, allowing flight just like an elytra, but with greater speed and no physical damage to the mantle at all.
astralsorcery.constellation.vicio.corrup: The very air turns against the movement of those inside the ritual, with flight disabled and great Slowness and Mining Fatigue inflicted.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.desc: Exposure to focused light of this Constellation will cause nearby life to flourish and greatly increase its produce.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.ench: This constellation saturates potions to grant Regeneration. Enchanting Armor and tools will let them magically Mend themselves of damage.<NL>Enchanted armor may also improve the wearer's health, and enchanted weapons may leech life from their foes.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.ritu: The ritual suffuses the area with an invigorated lifeforce - a nearby living creature experiences Regeneration, while a nearby crop grows at an accelerated rate. How frequently this occurs increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.mant: Bathed in the power of creation, wearing this mantle satiates the wearer's need for food and brings forth quicker healing. Walking off of blocks causes the mantle to hold you aloft, as if walking on thin air.
astralsorcery.constellation.aevitas.corr: The light of creation turns to decay, with living creatures sapped of life and strength, and plants disintegrating into dust.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.desc: The light of this constellation can shatter its way through materials and objects.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.ench: This constellation saturates potions to grant increased mining and attack Haste. Enchanted tools improve their Efficiency of use.<NL>Additionally, digging tools may see improved speed when harvesting their targeted blocks.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.ritu: Dispersing this constellation's light with a ritual causes thorough destruction, breaking any solid blocks except those that cannot be broken. How quickly a block is broken increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.mant: This mantle enhances your destructive potential, allowing you to break planes of blocks at once.
astralsorcery.constellation.evorsio.corr: Destruction turns to creation, with the air becoming dirt, stone, or sometimes ores.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.de: Standing in the light of this constellation, the very stone of the world glows strangely and its shape changes over time.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.en: This constellation saturates potions to grant increased mining and attack Haste. Enchanted tools will bring their wielder improved Fortune.<NL>Additionally, enchanted armor may improve tool efficiency, and digging tools may affect a larger area.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.ri: The light of this constellation transmutes ordinary stone into valuable minerals in a wide area. How often this transmutation occurs increases as more Starlight is channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.ma: A mantle infused with this constellation finds itself drawn to sought materials, where holding blocks in either hand will reveal their location in a twenty block radius despite obstructions.
astralsorcery.constellation.mineralis.co: Lucrative mineralization becomes obstructive, and the air turns to chunks of stone beneath the walker.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.desc: The light of this constellation seems immensely bright despite it being far away. Bright enough that it may trick some into thinking that it's day.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.ench: This constellation saturates potions to grant the ability to see in the dark. Helmets can be enchanted to have this same effect.<NL>Armor enchanted by Lucerna may increase a wearer's maximum Starlight Charge, and weapons and tools may improve Starlight Charge regeneration.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.ritu: While only Starlight, the fundamental brightness contained within the area of the ritual prevents creatures from arising in the dark; unless they are strong enough. The reach of the ritual increases based on the number of balancing lenses active on the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.mant: This mantle reveals all creatures, spawners, and containers within a 36 block radius, even through walls.
astralsorcery.constellation.lucerna.corr: Daylight is cast away, and the time of Starlight lasts far longer.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.d: This constellation shifts in time, only showing during significant astral occurrences. Its light twists time, accelerating things they shine upon.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.e: This constellation saturates potions to grant increased movement Speed, Haste, and greatly increased Luck. Enchanted weapons tend to find much more Loot in slain foes, and tools may bring great Fortune to their user.<NL>Enchanted tools and weapons may find themselves faster to re-use, helmets may improve perk XP gain, and armor may improve the effects of perks.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.r: This ritual accelerates all things mechanical and ticking, with nearby tile entities ticking their own clock at an increased rate. How quickly a clock advances for any block is based on the amount of Starlight channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.m: Wearers of a mantle attuned to time can freeze all hostiles nearby when attacked for a short period of time. There is a delay before time can be so abruptly disturbed again. Fire does not trigger this mantle effect.
astralsorcery.constellation.horologium.c: Nearby creatures and blocks are held in stasis, as if frozen in time.
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.descr: This constellation's light makes water softly bubble, and sea life seems much more abundant under its rays.
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.encha: This constellation saturates potions to grant the ability to breathe and see under the sea. Enchanted helmets endow the user with enhanced underwater Respiration.<NL>Enchanted armor may improve swim speed.
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.ritua: The light of this constellation improves the harvest when fishing, and pulls fish and other objects to the surface of the water. This works best when used in the ocean, and the frequency of this harvest increases with channeled Starlight.
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.mantl: A mantle infused with this constellation makes moving through water as effortlessly as in air, granting the ability to breathe underwater and handle tools and weapons as though there was no water at all.
astralsorcery.constellation.octans.corru: The ocean rebels, with a sea forming around the pedestal, a violent deluge of fish falling from the sky, and other nearby liquids drying to sand.
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.descr: These soft rays of light keep animals happy and healty.
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.encha: This constellation saturates potions to grant satiation of hunger. Enchanted tools can have a Touch as soft as Silk, and tridents find themselves Loyal to their thrower.<NL>Enchanted armor may improve the health of the wearer, and melee weapons become able to strike foes from further away.
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.ritua: Herdable animals bathed in this constellation's light relax and become fecund, as well as magically shed their produce. How frequently this occurs is based on the amount of Starlight channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.mantl: Wearing a mantle attuned to this constellation summons three companion Flares to follow you, which attack any foe that strikes you first.
astralsorcery.constellation.bootes.corru: Care turns to slaughter, as creatures of the field are butchered by the ritual while leaving an overabundance of resources behind.
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.descr: A strong and intense heat follows closely to this constellation's light.
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.encha: This constellation saturates potions to grant Fire Resistance. Enchanted weapons set foes on fire and tools smelt and Scorch their mined blocks.<NL>Enchanted weapons may land a critical hit more easily. Enchanted armor may boost the strength of critical hits.
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.ritua: Distributing wide the energies of this constellation prevents it from setting open fires, but the sustained heat will cause nearby blocks to melt or simply burn. The speed of this depends on the amount of channeled Starlight.
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.mantl: While wearing this mantle, fire and lava will mend and heal the user's flesh, rather than causing damage.
astralsorcery.constellation.fornax.corru: Heat flees the area, with liquids freezing, fires extinguished, and the very moisture in the air freezing into solid blocks of ice.
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.des: The irresistible and unnaturally compulsive rays of this set of stars are only visible during the darkest or brightest nights.
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.enc: This constellation saturates potions to grant improved health Regeneration and Absorption of damage. Enchanted fishing rods Lure fish, and bows never run out of ammunition.<NL>Enchanted armor may extend the duration of consumed potions, and may also improve chances of dodging a blow.
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.rit: Immersing the nearby area in the light of this constellation conjures life, regardless of Lucerna's nearby light, if any. The frequency of this conjuration increases based on the amount of Starlight channeled into the ritual.
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.man: A mantle infused with this constellation will manifest Starlight into animated echoes of tools and weapons when they are used, mimicking the wearer's behavior when breaking blocks with a pickaxe, chopping down trees with an axe, or striking enemies with their weapons.
astralsorcery.constellation.pelotrio.cor: Inner darkness is called forth, erupting from nearby creatures and twisting them into dire, darker forms. These creatures, when slain, have an abundance of loot burst forth from them.
astralsorcery.constellation.gelu.descrip: The cold depths of the Astral are a perfect match for this chilly constellation's supernatural powers.
astralsorcery.constellation.gelu.enchant: This constellation saturates potions to grant Resistance to damage and fire, but may Slow the imbiber. Enchanted boots can Freeze the surface of water walked on and reduce falling damage. Enchanted items are less likely to break through use.<NL>Enchanted armor may improve the strength of worn enchantments, digging tools may have greater reach, and weapons may have more powerful critical hits.
astralsorcery.constellation.gelu.trait: As the insidious cold diminishes output with its deep chill, so too does it spread wide its embrace, increasing the reach of a ritual nearly four times over, but reducing its strength to nearly one sixth.
astralsorcery.constellation.ulteria.desc: The faint light of this constellation endures, even across the vast distances it travels, like an unstoppable, otherworldly juggernaut.
astralsorcery.constellation.ulteria.ench: This constellation saturates potions to grant superior Absorption of damage and Regeneration, at the cost of offensive strength. Enchanted items are resistant to damage through use, and enchanted armor can magically reduce the power of fire, projectiles, and explosions.<NL>Enchanted armor may further reduce elemental damage, melee weapons may reflect damage to attackers, and ranged weapons may improve the ability to dodge blows.
astralsorcery.constellation.ulteria.trai: Drawing close the ritual's energy, it increases in power four times over, but shrinks to one fifth its normal size.
astralsorcery.constellation.alcara.descr: All things in the universe have their own subtle harmony to them. The light of this constellation changes those vibrations, twisting them to other ends.
astralsorcery.constellation.alcara.encha: This constellation saturates potions to greatly boost the imbiber's Luck, make them Invisible in plain sight, and increase their movement Speed. Enchanted fishing rods are more effective in all ways, tools gentle in touch, swords far more destructive to a target's allies, and crossbows far easier to reload.<NL>Armor may increase the length of a wearer's Rampage, melee weapons may leave bleeding wounds, and projectiles may fly far faster.
astralsorcery.constellation.alcara.trait: Attuned crystals are far more likely to Fracture while used, and their effects become discordant and Corrupted. The exact impact depends on the primary constellation.
astralsorcery.constellation.vorux.descri: Light from this constellation invokes rage and aggression in all beings, even from the far depths of the Astral.
astralsorcery.constellation.vorux.enchan: This constellation saturates potions to grant increased Strength and Resistance to damage, at the cost of increased muscular fatigue. Enchanted weapons cause more harm to their targets in all ways, and crossbows can Pierce their targets and shields, injuring those behind them.<NL>Enchanted armor may improve the movement speed of the wearer.
astralsorcery.constellation.vorux.trait: Burning the candle at both ends provides more illumination, but invites darkness all the faster. Ritual power and reach are nearly doubled, but Fracturing will occour far quicker.

perk.astralsorcery.key.damage_armor.name: 身体阻断
perk.astralsorcery.key.damage_armor.desc: 在穿上所有盔甲时将承受5%%的伤害
perk.astralsorcery.key.no_knockback.name: 千斤坠
perk.astralsorcery.key.projectile_close_: 用弹射物攻击敌人的距离越近，
弹射物造成的伤害越大。但若是
距离太远，造成的伤害也会变小。
perk.astralsorcery.key.projectile_distan: 造成的伤害越大。如果敌人
太近，造成的伤害也会变小。
perk.astralsorcery.key.rampage.name: 横冲直撞
perk.astralsorcery.key.disarm.name: 无懈可击
perk.astralsorcery.key.dig_types.name: 上帝视角
perk.astralsorcery.key.charge_regen.name: 星能隧穿
perk.astralsorcery.key.aoe_effect.name: 范围效果
perk.astralsorcery.key.aoe_effect.desc.2: 清场攻击也适用于远程攻击。
perk.astralsorcery.key.enduring.name: 持久力
perk.astralsorcery.key.undead_bane.name: 亡灵天灾
perk.astralsorcery.key.void_trash.name: 变废为宝
perk.astralsorcery.key.void_trash.desc.1: 虚空持续掉落垃圾物品。
perk.astralsorcery.key.void_trash.desc.2: 偶尔能在清理垃圾时出产有价值的矿物。
perk.astralsorcery.key.mending.name: 修复
perk.astralsorcery.key.mending.desc: 有时你的护甲会缓慢的自我修复。
perk.astralsorcery.key.step_assist.name: 梯云纵
perk.astralsorcery.key.magnet_drops.name: 空间操纵
perk.astralsorcery.key.magnet_drops.desc: 在挖矿或击杀怪物时掉落的物品
将直接转移到你的背包。
perk.astralsorcery.key.mantle_flight.des: 现在虚御座的披风拥有飞行能力
而不是像鞘翅那样的滑翔。
perk.astralsorcery.key.thorns_ranged.des: 可以反弹受到的远程伤害。
perk.astralsorcery.key.revive.name: 凤凰守护
perk.astralsorcery.key.revive.desc: 给你一次涅槃重生的机会。
perk.astralsorcery.key.no_armor.name: 皮糙肉厚
perk.astralsorcery.key.damage_types.name: 诅咒之触
perk.astralsorcery.key.damage_types.desc: 增加中毒或凋零的几率
perk.astralsorcery.key.cull_attack.name: 致命打击
敌人的生命值若低于最大值
perk.astralsorcery.key.bleed.name: 撕裂
perk.astralsorcery.key.bleed.desc.1: 在击中生物后有几率施加失血效果
perk.astralsorcery.key.bleed.desc.2: 且在流血期间受到持续伤害。
perk.astralsorcery.key.arc.name: 闪电弧光链
perk.astralsorcery.key.arc.desc.2: 在其与附近的其他怪物间
perk.astralsorcery.key.low_life.name: 一息尚存
perk.astralsorcery.key.low_life.desc.2: 将获得更高的伤害与更快的挖掘速度。
perk.astralsorcery.key.luck.name: 一贯的运气
perk.astralsorcery.key.entity_reach.name: 熟能生巧
perk.astralsorcery.key.entity_reach.desc: 阻止范围效果应用于攻击范围上。
perk.astralsorcery.special.focus.gelu.de: 每个已获得的技能额外增加+2%%的技能效率。
不与其他的技能效率强化效果连用。
你只能拥有一个固有技能。
perk.astralsorcery.special.focus.ulteria: 每个未使用的技能点额外+5%%技能经验。
你只能拥有一个固有技能。
perk.astralsorcery.special.focus.vorux.d: 每个已获得的技能额外增加+1%%的技能效率。
你将无法获得技能经验。
你只能拥有一个固有技能。
